programme.desc: After a kidnapped swordsman is surprisingly rescued by the father he had been looking for, he also learns about his mother from him.

programme.title: Pursuit of a Killer

programme.desc: Director Chor Yuen reunites with novelist, Gu Long, and superstar, Ti Lung, in this exciting sequel to Clans of Intrigue.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three-armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor & his assistant must put up the fight of their lives to stop them from obtaining a bullet that is a key piece of evidence.

programme.title: Distinction

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: This comedy depicts a group of friends who have grown apart. reasons. Little do they expect that they will one day reconnect over a lost bottle of breast milk.
